backend/main.mo: Main Motoko canister defining data models, storage maps, authorization mixins, branding config, and Stripe initialization logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping copy‑link feature IDs to the frontend files and components implementing them.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend TypeScript/React file in the project.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base/theme configuration defining CSS variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML file mounting the React app and loading the main entry script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React routing configuration using TanStack Router with layouts, routes, profile setup dialog, and theme/notification providers.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminBrand: Provides an admin interface to view, edit, validate, and submit branding settings including images, social links, and language configuration.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminProdu: Displays products and allows admins to create and delete products using a modal form.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminServi: Lists existing services and provides UI for creating and deleting services through a dialog form.
frontend/src/components/admin/BrandingIm: Reusable component for editing a list of image URLs with previews, error handling, and add/remove controls.
frontend/src/components/admin/StripePaym: Form for viewing Stripe configuration status and updating secret key and allowed countries.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button handling Internet Identity authentication and loading state.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Dialog requiring new users to enter and save their name before proceeding.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Simple footer component showing copyright text and a link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Main header with navigation, social links, language selector, cart indicator, auth controls, and a copy‑link button using clipboard + toast.
frontend/src/hooks/useLanguagePreference: Manages language selection using site branding and localStorage, providing the current and available languages.
frontend/src/hooks/useOrders.ts: Fetches caller orders and provides a mutation to create new orders with automatic cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useProducts.ts: Retrieves the list of products from the actor when available.
frontend/src/hooks/useServices.ts: Fetches available service items from the actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useStripeCheckout.ts: Creates Stripe checkout sessions by calling the backend and validating the returned session.
frontend/src/hooks/useStripeConfig.ts: Checks if Stripe is configured and provides a mutation to update Stripe settings with cache refresh.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and custom CSS variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/AccountPage.tsx: Displays the authenticated user's profile and order history with loading states.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminDashboardP: Admin dashboard with tabs for managing services, products, branding, and payment settings.
frontend/src/pages/CartPage.tsx: Shows cart contents with quantity controls, item removal, and a link to checkout or store browsing.
frontend/src/pages/CheckoutPage.tsx: Provides an authenticated checkout summary with total calculation and a checkout initiation button.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Renders the homepage with branding assets, hero section, and feature highlights linking to services and store.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentFailurePage.ts: Displays a payment cancellation message with links back to the cart or store.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentSuccessPage.ts: Shows a payment success message, clears the cart, and offers links to orders or the store.
frontend/src/pages/ProductDetailPage.tsx: Fetches and displays detailed product info with add‑to‑cart and navigation options.
frontend/src/pages/ServiceDetailPage.tsx: Shows detailed service information with pricing, description, and a contact prompt.
frontend/src/pages/ServicesPage.tsx: Lists all services with loading skeletons and links to individual service pages.
frontend/src/pages/StorePage.tsx: Displays a product grid with branding banners, loading states, and add‑to‑cart actions.
frontend/src/state/cart.ts: Zustand store managing cart items with add, remove, update, clear, and total calculation logic.
frontend/src/utils/copyToClipboard.ts: Provides a safe clipboard copy function using the Clipboard API with a textarea fallback and error-handled boolean result.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading URL parameters, storing/retrieving them in sessionStorage, and handling hash-based routing with persistence.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending theme colors, fonts, container settings, and enabling plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: JSON file describing the project's current state, versioning, core features, and architectural notes for the business app.
